content.question: In the context of the passage as a whole, which of the following best describes the function of the final sentence?

choices.label: It acknowledges a concession that the author feels obliged to make.
It makes the author more memorable by presenting a compelling image.
It restates an important element of the author’s main argument.
It urges readers to act in accordance with the author’s beliefs.

content.answer: It restates an important element of the author’s main argument.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
